## Contributor Checklist
- [ ] I used the canonical folder structure under `content/`.
- [ ] I filled required metadata fields (id, type, title, summary, tags, author, license, compatibility, updated_at).
- [ ] I added a `## Usage` section for markdown-based items.
- [ ] I ran `npm run validate:content` locally.
- [ ] I ran `npm run build:index` locally.
- [ ] I verified there are no secrets, binaries, or disallowed file types.
- [ ] I included `safety_notes` for risky instructions, if applicable.
